import {useState} from "react" const ShelfMain=({shelf,listBook,updateShelf})=>{ const handleupdate=(b,event)=> { listboo updateShelf(b, event) console.log(event) } return(

{shelf.name}

    {listBook .filter( (b) => b.shelf.replace(/ +/g, "").toLowerCase() === shelf.name.replace(/ +/g, "").toLowerCase() ) .map((book) => (
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. ))}
) } export default ShelfMain;
